rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes conditions for lifting measures factually without high-potency language.
The segment describes conditions and future outcomes.
The segment does not contain a question.
The segment explains when birds can go outside, which is factual/conditional, not explicit calming.
The segment states 'Once the risk levels have reduced... birds will be able to go outside again', which is not a bare negation.
